title: Instructional Design Expert Course for Preparing Industry Career Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced domain knowledge in science and foundational instructional design theory
context.additional_context: Customized Instructional Design Competency Enhancement Program Reflecting Industrial Field Experiences in Science

learning_goals: Learners can identify and apply three or more instructional design strategies suitable for industrial workplace contexts.
Learners can design two or more educational contents reflecting science-related job environments
Learners can develop and operate smartphone-based instructional materials at least once in a limited technological environment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
